intro: Odontarrhena condensata subsp. flexibilis, commonly known as the flexible odontarrhena, is a flowering plant native to parts of Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its slender, climbing stems and small, clustered flowers. It typically grows in forest understories and thrives in humid, shaded environments. Its botanical features make it a valuable species for ecological studies and conservation efforts.
